remarks: Define the class of Hilbert lattices, which are complete, atomic lattices satisfying the superposition principle and minimum height. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
statement:
df-hlat $p |- HL = { l e. ( ( OML i^i CLat ) i^i CvLat ) | ( A. a e. ( Atoms ` l ) A. b e. ( Atoms ` l ) ( a =/= b -> E. c e. ( Atoms ` l ) ( c =/= a /\ c =/= b /\ c ( le ` l ) ( a ( join ` l ) b ) ) ) /\ E. a e. ( Base ` l ) E. b e. ( Base ` l ) E. c e. ( Base ` l ) ( ( ( 0. ` l ) ( lt ` l ) a /\ a ( lt ` l ) b ) /\ ( b ( lt ` l ) c /\ c ( lt ` l ) ( 1. ` l ) ) ) ) } $.
$d a b c l $.
